thread.title: Samsung tips record Q1 profit as chip boom winds down

title: Samsung tips record Q1 profit as chip boom winds down
text:
Samsung tips record Q1 profit as chip boom winds down Friday, April 06, 2018 - 01:36 
Samsung tips a surprise record first-quarter profit but its shares fall after the announcement. As Ciara Lee reports, markets were reacting to concerns that the semiconductor boom that has driven the South Korean tech giant's earnings is about to end.   
Samsung tips a surprise record first-quarter profit but its shares fall after the announcement. As Ciara Lee reports, markets were reacting to concerns that the semiconductor boom that has driven the South Korean tech giant's earnings is about to end.  //reut.rs/2qc55se
